control_attributes.control_description: The organization uses lockable physical casings to protect [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] from unauthorized physical access.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization marks [Assignment: organization-defined information system output devices] indicating the appropriate security marking of the information permitted to be output from the device.

Control Statement: The organization uses lockable physical casings to protect [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] from unauthorized physical access.
